comment: The main text box containing Chinese characters in seal script and explanatory text in regular script, arranged vertically in columns. The content appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or linguistic work, possibly related to the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The left margin includes vertical annotations such as '大艸' (Dà cǎo), '說文上三十三', '上下', and '丁元', indicating section, volume, and possibly publisher or edition details.
